Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone device that allows two students to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how sound travels through the string in the telephone device.
The student can represent the materials used to build the string telephone, using only the specified materials.
The student can show in their drawing the expected feature that the string telephone sends or receives sound.
The student can depict in their illustration how using a string telephone device helps people communicate over a distance.
